title: Maps of Meaning, the Ouroboros and the Truly Unexpected Event Exposing our Fantasy World
description:
From 47:45 to 1:07:50, we discuss Jordan Peterson's warning and advice about what to do in an "unexpected event" like our current crisis.

Michael and I discuss Jordan Peterson's ideas about the Dragon of Chaos, the uncertainty of our current environment, the threat and promise implicit in the time of coronavirus, and the hope for the path forward.

Along the way, we touch on what it means to know ourselves and others, P v. NP completeness, outsourcing our sanity, and seeing Love as the perfect blend of Justice and Mercy, or Unity and Multiplicity, or Structure and Flexibility.

Lex Fridman on AI and Machine Learning (dumb systems):
https://youtu.be/5qjA8HPJl_0

Jordan Peterson Redifining Reality (Ted Talk):
https://youtu.be/WOgSqHtTtHY

Jordan Peterson on Potential, Phenomenon and Lovers
https://youtu.be/tLteWutitFM
